altername_name: Bounty Hunter IV: The Reality of Time
name: Bounty Hunter IIII: The Reality of Time
overview: Another game in the Bounty Hunter series this time with somewhat improved graphics, more types of enemies and a bit more challenge. But everything does look startlingly similar to earlier games in the series. That, along with a lack of understanding in how Roman numerals work make this a bit of a lackluster release. That said, if you enjoyed the previous parts of the collection enough is the same that you will likely enjoy this one.
